# Part 1

### Gamma Distribution



```{r}
gd <- -seq(from = -6,to = 6,length.out=1000)
plot(gd, dgamma(gd, 3, 1),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='PDF',
     main='Probability Density Function of Gamma Distribution')

plot(gd, pgamma(gd, 3, 1),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='CDF',
     main='Cummulative Density Function of Gamma Distribution')
```

#### Log Transformation

```{r}
plot(dgamma(log(1:120), shape = 3, scale = 1),
     type = "l",
     main = "Probability Density Function",
     ylab = "Y = log(x)")
mean(dgamma(log(1:120), shape = 3, scale = 1))
median(dgamma(log(1:120), shape = 3, scale = 1))

plot(pgamma(log(1:120), shape = 3, scale = 1),
     type = "l",
     main = "Cummulative Distribution Function",
     ylab = "Y = log(x)")
mean(pgamma(log(1:120), shape = 3, scale = 1))
median(pgamma(log(1:120), shape = 3, scale = 1))
```


### Normal Distribution



```{r}
nd <- -seq(from = -5,to = 5,length.out=1000)
plot(nd, dnorm(nd, -1, 1),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='PDF',
     main='Probability Density Function of Normal Distribution')

plot(nd, pnorm(nd, -1, 1),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='CDF',
     main='Cummulative Density Function of Normal Distribution')

```

#### Log Transformation

```{r}
nd <- -seq(from = -5,to = 5,length.out=100)
plot(nd, log(dnorm(nd, -1, 1)),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='PDF',
     main='Probability Density Function of Normal Distribution')

plot(nd, log(pnorm(nd, -1, 1)),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='CDF',
     main='Cummulative Density Function of Normal Distribution')


plot(dnorm(log(1:5), -1, 1),
     type = "l",
     main = "Probability Density Function",
     ylab = "Y = log(x)")
mean(dnorm(log(1:5), -1, 1))
median(dnorm(log(1:5), -1, 1))

plot(pnorm(log(1:5), -1, 1),
     type = "l",
     main = "Cummulative Distribution Function",
     ylab = "Y = log(x)")
mean(pnorm(log(1:5), -1, 1))
median(pnorm(log(1:5), -1, 1))
```


### Uniform Distribution



```{r}
ud <- -seq(from = -5,to = 5,length.out=1000)
plot(ud, dunif(ud, 0, 12),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='PDF',
     main='Probability Density Function of Unifrom Distribution')

plot(ud, punif(ud, 0, 12),
     type = "l",
     xlab='x',
     ylab='CDF',
     main='Cummulative Density Function of Uniform Distribution')
```

#### Log Transformations

```{r}
plot(dunif(log(1:18), 0, 12),
     type = "l",
     main = "Probability Density Function",
     ylab = "Y = log(x)")
mean(dunif(log(1:18),0,12))
median(dunif(log(1:18), 0, 12))

plot(punif(log(1:18),0,12),
     type = "l",
     main = "Cummulative Distribution Function",
     ylab = "Y = log(x)")
mean(punif(log(1:18),0,12))
median(punif(log(1:18), 0, 12))
```
